title: Spicy Lentil Soup
shortDescription: Experience the heat and heartiness of this flavorful lentil soup that will warm you up in no time.
fullDescription: Experience the heat and heartiness of this flavorful lentil soup that will warm you up in no time. Packed with nutritious ingredients and aromatic spices.

instructionGroups.label: For the lentil soup
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add chopped onion, minced garlic, diced carrot, and sliced celery. Saut√© until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
Add ground cumin, ground coriander, and cayenne pepper. Stir well to coat the vegetables with the spices.
Pour in vegetable broth and add rinsed red lentils.
Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes or until lentils are tender.
Garnish with freshly chopped cilantro before serving.

tips: Adjust the amount of cayenne pepper based on your spice preference.
Serve the soup with a side of crusty bread for a complete meal.
For added richness, drizzle some olive oil on top of each serving.
Leftovers can be refrigerated for up to 3 days.
